messages.content: Workflow paused for human review. Please check the HITL review panel.

interrupt.title: Invoice Requires Manual Review
interrupt.message: This invoice could not be auto-processed. Please review the validation results, warnings, and exceptions. Decide whether to approve, reject, or request more information.
